articles.author: Radifah Kabir
articles.title: Astronomer Carl Sagan Death Anniversary: Know About The Pioneer In US Space Program And Research Of Extrasolar Planets - ABP Live
articles.description: Carl Sagan was an American astronomer known for his books and television series 'Cosmos'. He was a pioneer in NASA's US Space progam, and in astronomical research.

articles.title: Covid Surge Puts Many Americans on Edge About Traveling - The New York Times
articles.description: Fear of the virus is causing some to rethink their holiday plans, while others say they will proceed, perhaps with more caution.

articles.title: Fauci says Omicron variant is `just raging around the world' - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: The COVID-19 omicron variant is “just raging around the world,” the White House's top medical adviser said Sunday as President Joe Biden prepares to issue “a stark warning of what the winter will look like” for unvaccinated Americans.
